title: LeakSkyWars点击NPC报错
txt_content:
LeakSkyWars在点击NPC后 BC端报错 并且弹回大厅(BungeeKick)
Citizens的NPC却正常[17:49:15] [Netty Worker IO Thread #0/INFO]: [dawesin|/171.14.168.118:6885] <-> ServerConnector [skywars] has connected
[17:49:16] [Netty Worker IO Thread #0/INFO]: [/171.14.168.118:6885|dawesin] <-> DownstreamBridge <-> [lobby] has disconnected

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 应该给出 npc 所在的服务器的日志。
@xmdhs 就只是断开连接而已...并没有其他报错
